content.rendered:
Classic Labyrinth 3d – The wooden maze funny game with the steel ball everyone knows comes to your browser! Enjoy this classic marble maze labyrinth. Features:- Accurate ball physic simulation- Joystick Controler- Smooth ball movement- Personal highscores- 3 Star rating system- One coin per 3 Star finished level- Realistic sounds- Coins to continue, if you fail during the level.
Use mouse or arrow / wasd keys to move the steelball to the target. Avoid the holes and obstacles.Collect coins by finishing the level as fast as possible.Use the coins to continue after you fell into a hole.
